title: Are mystery champions gone?
body:
So, I feel like I've looked in every plausible area in the client, and I cannot find the mystery champion shards. They were there before the blue essence changes, and there afterwards. Were they apart of that blue essence shop?

They aren't under the champions tab, nor under the hextech crafting tab. If it's not there, that's sad, but I'd like to know.

replies.body: Unfortunately they were part of the Blue Essence Shop, so they are gone for now (if the store ever returns).

These were in fact tied to the Blue Essence Emporium now. There's a pretty good chance of them popping back up during any special event shops, so be sure to check the store and the news page for those updates!

Well, at least I know.

Time to buy Nidalee I guess... Thanks!
